Titular: Amazon in focus as Oppenheimer sees 'significant upside' from AWS
Resumen: * Amazon (AMZN [https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/AMZN]) was in focus on Monday as investment firm Oppenheimer raised its price target on the tech giant, citing the belief there will be “significant upside” from Amazon Web Services for the foreseeable future. * AWS is set to double capacity through 2027, with “at least” 1 gigawatt worth of capacity added in the fourth quarter, Oppenheimer analyst Jason Helfstein said.
